item.description:
The purpose of this Meetup is to meet people in the area with interests in web technology.

Discuss ideas or plans for websites. Discuss ways of getting websites developed.

Talk about other general computer related topics.

If you want to learn how to build websites, or learn about social networks.

If you know nothing or everything about development then this is for you. Meet people who can help or want to be helped.
item.name: The Manchester/Hartford Area Web Devs/Innovators October Meetup
